name: Booster's Day Out
description:
Your browser might freeze for a bit on initial load, I'm investigating this! Use latest Chrome or Firefox for best results.

Booster's Day Out is a physics-based, action-y, puzzle-y spaceflight journey. Guide Booster the rocket back to its tiny home planet, making sure to stay fueled up along the way!

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38. Check out the Ludum Dare page!
